ValidationRule.description: Bonus Rebate should not be modified for the Basis Point Rebate and Volume Bonus Rebate Products
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( SBQQ__Schedule__r.Name <> "Basis Point Rebate", TEXT(Bonus_Rebate__c) = "Basis Point Rebate on OON Fuel Spend(3)" ), AND( SBQQ__Schedule__r.Name <> "Volume Bonus Rebate", TEXT(Bonus_Rebate__c) = "All Shell Volume Bonus Rebate in CPG" ), AND( SBQQ__Schedule__r.Name = "Basis Point Rebate", TEXT(Bonus_Rebate__c) <> "Basis Point Rebate on OON Fuel Spend(3)" ), AND( SBQQ__Schedule__r.Name = "Volume Bonus Rebate", TEXT(Bonus_Rebate__c) <> "All Shell Volume Bonus Rebate in CPG" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Bonus Rebate selection for this Product
